attributes.action: ENSURE THAT BENEFIT RECIPIENTS RECEIVE NO MORE THAN THE MINIMUM WAGE.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
CLAIMING BENEFITS CAN BE MORE FINANCIALLY REWARDING THAN WORKING. BENEFIT PAYMENTS SHOULD BE FOR SHORT TERM NEED ONLY AND NOT TREATED AS A WAY TO MAKE MONEY WITHOUT HAVING TO LIFT A FINGER.
MAKE IT WORTHWHILE TO WORK DONT ENCOURAGE SCROUNGERS.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
